description: Lawnchair 2 is an Android app that enables users to customize their home screen. For example, users can utilize Lawnchair 2 to customize their Android widgets, or to add new Android home screen features to old devices.

If a Lawnchair 2 user wants to back up and/or share their custom home screen with another user, they can save the screen as a SHED file. SHED files are Zip-compressed files, which contain the .XML , .DB , and .PNG files used to display a Lawnchair 2 home screen.
